name: Sekh hasina
review: Smooth and quiet. No engined car can match it.Quick. Few cars can match it. You have to go to a Dodge Challenger Hellcat to beat 4.2 0-60. Love to wow new passengers with that thrust.

name: Khaleda Zia
review: This car is very impressive and easy to maintain, but tesla Should update its shield of this for VIP persons like us.

name: Volodymyr Zelenskyy
review: The Model 3 Performance is everything in one. It is fast (very fast), it is quiet and comfortable; very comfortable seats actually. The White interior looks amazing, and it actually makes you want to keep the interior clean for once. .

name: Putin Vai
review: This car never fails to surprise me, it's out of this world. I highly recommend taking one of these for a test drive, you will not be disappointed.

name: Modi Sarkar
review: Awesome.    Love it.   Purchased for a 100 mile a day commute    Could not have made a better choice especially with gas on the rise!.

name: Kim Jong Un
review: Tesla voided my warranty due to dust AC repair. How do you avoid dust living in Nevada? How does dust get into AC anyways they couldn't answer implied I put it there worst company I have ever dealt with..
